long_description: This topographic map features trails in the North Lake Tahoe Basin open for recreational use, with special emphasis on mountain biking. Full-color map lists developed and primitive roads, parking and staging areas, biking parks, campgrounds and picnic areas. Special keys identify trailheads and rate trails as easy, moderate or difficult; mountain bike trails are shown by route number. Reverse side features 14 trail rides with descriptive narratives, photos and elevation graphs; also lists special considerations for trail users. Map scale 1:63,360; contour intervals are set at 80 feet. Folded map measures 9 x 4 inches; unfolded 36 x 24 inches. Published by Fine Edge Productions, copyright 2002.
short_description: This topographic map features trails in the North Lake Tahoe Basin open for recreational use, with special emphasis on mountain biking.
